Alternatively, if you're open to something a bit more unconventional, "Redline" (2009) is an anime feature that takes the auto racing genre to new heights - literally!

Based on your interest in Fast & Furious, I think you might enjoy "Maid in Manhattan"! It's an action-packed rom-com with a lot of energy and excitement, plus a great cast featuring Chris Eigeman, Vincent De Paul, and Natasha Richardson. And who knows, maybe Brooke's fast-paced lifestyle will keep up the pace you're looking for!

Alternatively, if you're open to something completely different, I'd recommend "In the Woods"! It's an intriguing indie film that takes you on a wild ride through an urban forest, exploring what it means to be a monster. The unscripted story and enthusiastic showrunner monster boy, Max, will keep you engaged and curious.

Let me know if either of these options strike your fancy!
